# opacity

**Instance Property**

Opacity of the point.

## Declaration

```swift
var opacity: CGFloat { get }
```

## Discussion

The opacity of a [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKStrokePointReference] has a range of 0-2, which is a multiplier of the ink opacity.

## Getting the point’s drawing data

- **size**: The size of the point.
- **secondaryScale**
